properties.address: Gospel Hall, High Peak, Derbyshire SK23 7LA
properties.description: Wednesday in term time. Youth drop in TNT 3.10-5pm. Wednesday 23 Jan "Come to coffee" 10.30 - 12 noon Friday 9 Feb "Family fun night" 5.30-7.30pm. Pizzas, games, crafts, etc with a short gathering time. Hot drinks provided. Church building on the level with accessible toilet. Wheelchair ramp provided. No parking. Park on the road further down Old Road or on Chapel Road.
properties.title: Good News Church, Whaley Bridge

properties.description: A welcoming space for anyone above the age of 18. We are located next door to Jack's Barbers shop, at the back of the small car park next to Sainsbury's.
properties.title: Grapevine Wellbeing Centre

properties.description: Welcome to the grade II listed Pump Room in the heart of Buxton. Open 10.00 - 16.00 daily, you can receive free hot drinks, charge your devices and enjoy the historic space. We also have fruit and biscuits and access to Buxton mineral water flowing straight from the spring at 27.5c On Fridays we have Crafternoons 1-3pm where you can come, make and take home your creations with expert tuition. The final Friday morning of each month is Pitter Patter for the under-fives and their adults from 9.20am. Come for a social event with dressing up, books, toys and lots of fun within the Crescent building. For complimentary hot drinks, simply come in, take a seat at one of our café tables and a member of staff will be over to offer you a beverage. Crafternoons and Pitter Patter are bookable on our website, use the discount code WARMSPACE to reduce the ticket price to free.
properties.title: The Pump Room

properties.description: The space is open to all and includes tea/coffee/biscuits, free wifi and games

properties.description: Common areas and cafe open daily, from 9 am to 8.30 pm. (Except for solo hire events.) All our ground floors are open including comfy living room, library and entrance hall.
